categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The battle of Randa was a battle of the Galactic Civil War.
Sometime between the Battle of Yavin and the Battle of Endor, the Galactic Empire decimated the Rebel base on Randa. The Imperial operation was led by Admiral Gaen Drommel.
As a reward for this success, Admiral Drommel would eventually be given command of the Executor-class Star Dreadnought Guardian.
